com.b2international.index.lucene

Interface IndexField<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - - the type of the value to store in this index field
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BinaryDocValuesIndexField, LongCollectionIndexField, NumericDocValuesIndexField<T>, StoredIndexField<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanIndexField, DocValuesFloatIndexField, DocValuesIntIndexField, DocValuesLongIndexField, DocValuesStringIndexField, DocValuesTextIndexField, EmptyIndexField, FilteredIndexField, FilteredLongIndexField, FloatIndexField, IndexFieldBase, IndexFieldDelegate, IntIndexField, LongIndexField, StoredOnlyDocValuesLongIndexField, StoredOnlyIndexField, StringIndexField, StringIndexFieldBase, TextIndexField

    public interface IndexField<T>
    Since:
    4.3
